mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Budget-friendly alternative starting at $2.99/month, significantly cheaper than Wix. Delivered best performance in load speed tests on both mobile and desktop, beating Wix by significant margins. Offered e-commerce capabilities across all plans while Wix restricted to specific packages. Simpler interface with fewer options than Wix.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Best budget-friendly alternative starting at $2.99/month (1-4 year commitment) - among cheapest website builders available. Sites performed best in load speed testing on both mobile and desktop, significantly beating Wix. Easier drag-and-drop editor with fewer complex options. Offers e-commerce on all plans while Wix restricts to specific packages. Trade-off: lacks Wix's extensive app store and advanced blogging features.
